name: Battle of the Lost Continent
description:
This is a small rpg game, but it is extremely difficult to pass!

You need endurance and skill to reach your ultimate goal!

Story: When you were an adult, you were told that there was a mysterious ring around you when you were young. This ring is related to your life experience. In order to further explore the layers of black fog, you embarked on the search journey.

Advanced tips:

-Make rational use of the gold coins dropped by monsters. Every map has a shop to increase your strength as soon as possible

-Try to accumulate more materials (gold coins), and there is no turning back
